Html: PHPExcel seems to be unable to load from an Excel2007 file (cacheinmemory) and save the in-memory object to an Excel2007 file (by renaming the script as xlsx).

It was an error in PHP 5.2: the PHP_ZIP extension caused corrupt zip files (as .xlsx actually is a .xls.zip file).

Many thanks to Maarten for resolving this problem.

 

Johan
